title: Chocolate Curry Cupcakes
ingredients: ['110g baking quality margarine', '150g vanilla sugar (or caster sugar with 1 teaspoon of vanilla extract)', '1 egg', '120g low fat natural yoghurt', '125ml milk', '125g self raising flour', '60g 100% cocoa powder', '1 teaspoon curry powder', '1/2 teaspoon chilli powder', '1/2 teaspoon cinnamon', '70g low-fat cream cheese, room temp', '1 tbl butter, room temp', '220g pure icing sugar', '4 cubes Lindt dark chilli chocolate, finely chopped or grated']
